title: Windows 8.1 AIO 18in1 OEM ESD en-US Aug 2016 {Gen2}
description:
* Windows 8.1 AIO 18in1 OEM ESD en-US Aug 2016 {Gen2}


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: W81X86X64.AIO.OEM.ESD.ENU.Aug2016.iso
* Size: 5,49GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: f7f0da74
* MD5 : c462d492898c39afc8b1d91a14f62b8e
* SHA-1: 4383da6bd02dadbf5033d3e887e07c6e62b111c8

[ SOURCES ]
 
* 32bit: dvd-6051550 & 6050710
* 64bit: dvd-6051480 & 6054382 

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed:

* .NET Framework 3.5 enabled
* .NET Framework 4.6.2 (KB3181564)
* Updates -> 2016-08-09
* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

[ LANGUAGE ]

* en-US = ENGLISH US

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* 32bit:
* Windows 8.1 Home - - - - STD / KMS / OEM
* Windows 8.1 Pro- - - - - STD / KMS / OEM
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise - STD / KMS / OEM

* 64bit:
* Windows 8.1 Home - - - - STD / KMS / OEM
* Windows 8.1 Pro- - - - - STD / KMS / OEM
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise - STD / KMS / OEM

* STD = Standard installation
* KMS = Activated by KMS
* OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) will automatically 
* activate original version installed by Manufacturer.

* Exclusions for KMS are pre-set in Defender.

[ SCREENSHOTS ]

[url]http://extraimago.com/image/wOm8[/url]

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

[ CREDITS ]
* ashish.k & stevie-boy for continued
* support & help with user questions.

* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 @ ET, KAT & TPB
